elementSpec.desc: represents the root node of a tree.
rappresenta il nodo radice di un albero
representa el nodo raíz de un árbol.

attDef.desc: provides the value of the root, which is a feature structure or other analytic element.
assegna alla radice un valore, che può essere una struttura di tratti o altro elemento di analisi
proporciona el valor de la raíz, que puede ser una estructura de rasgos u otro elemento de análisis.
当該根要素の値を示す．
attDef.valDesc: A valid identifier of a feature structure or other analytic element.

attDef.desc: provides a list of identifiers of the elements which are the children of the root node.
fornisce una lista di identificatori degli elementi figli del nodo radice
proporciona una lista de identificadores de elementos que son hijos (descendientes) de la raíz.
当該根要素の子要素の識別子を示す．

remarks.p: If the root has no children (i.e., the tree is trivial), then the children attribute must be omitted. For technical reasons, it cannot be specified as root children=''.

attDef.desc: indicates whether or not the root is ordered.
indica se la radice è ordinata
indica si la raíz es o no ordenada.
順序付であるかどうかを示す．

remarks.p: The value true indicates that the children of the root are ordered, whereas false indicates the are unordered.
Use if and only if ord is specified as partial on the tree element and the root has more than one child.

attDef.desc: gives the out degree of the root, the number of its children.
indica il grado in uscita della radice, cioè il numero dei suoi figli
indica el grado en salida de la raíz, es decir, el número de hijos de esta.
当該根要素の子要素数を示す．

remarks.p: The in degree of the root is always 0.
